title: request_files Lambda Config
description: The config for the request_files Lambda.

asyncOperationId.description: The unique identifier used for tracking requests. If not present, will be generated.

orcaDefaultBucketOverride.description: Overrides the default bucket to copy to in os.environ['ORCA_DEFAULT_BUCKET'].

orcaDefaultRecoveryTypeOverride.description: Overrides the default restore type in os.environ['RESTORE_RETRIEVAL_TYPE'].
